member.name: T:AForge.IntRange
member.summary: Represents an integer range with minimum and maximum values

member.name: M:AForge.IntRange.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.IntRange.IsInside(System.Int32)
member.summary: Check if the specified value is inside this range
member.returns: True if the specified value is inside this range or false otherwise.

member.name: M:AForge.IntRange.IsInside(AForge.IntRange)
member.summary: Check if the specified range is inside this range
member.returns: True if the specified range is inside this range or false otherwise.

member.name: M:AForge.IntRange.IsOverlapping(AForge.IntRange)
member.summary: Check if the specified range overlaps with this range
member.returns: True if the specified range overlaps with this range or false otherwise.

member.name: P:AForge.IntRange.Min
member.summary: Minimum value

member.name: P:AForge.IntRange.Max
member.summary: Maximum value

member.name: P:AForge.IntRange.Length
member.summary: Length of the range (deffirence between maximum and minimum values)

member.name: T:AForge.Win32
member.summary: Windows API functions and structures.
member.remarks: Some Win32 API function's are used by the library to perform memory related routines.

member.name: M:AForge.Win32.LocalAlloc(AForge.Win32.MemoryFlags,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allocate the specified number of bytes from the heap.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is a handle to the newly allocated memory object. If the function fails, the return value is IntPtr.Zero.

member.name: M:AForge.Win32.LocalFree(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Free the specified local memory object and invalidate its handle.
member.param: Handle to the local memory object.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is IntPtr.Zero.

member.name: M:AForge.Win32.memcpy(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copy a block of memory.
member.returns: Return's the value of dst - pointer to destination.

member.name: M:AForge.Win32.memcpy(System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copy a block of memory.
member.returns: Return's the value of dst - pointer to destination.

member.name: M:AForge.Win32.memcpy(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copy a block of memory.
member.returns: Return's the value of dst - pointer to destination.

member.name: M:AForge.Win32.memset(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fills buffer with a specified value.
member.param: Value to use fo buffer filling.
member.returns: Return's the value of dst - pointer to destination.

member.name: M:AForge.Win32.memset(System.Byte*,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fills buffer with a specified value.
member.param: Value to use fo buffer filling.
member.returns: Return's the value of dst - pointer to destination.

member.name: T:AForge.Win32.MemoryFlags
member.summary: Memory allocation attributes.

member.summary: Allocates fixed memory

member.name: F:AForge.Win32.MemoryFlags.ZeroInit
member.summary: Initializes memory contents to zero

member.summary: Constructor (the class should not be instantiated at this moment)

member.param: Expression written in postfix polish notation
